### Summary | <small> Calendar Name </small>

```{r}
smry_calendar %>%
  reactable(
    .,
    pagination = TRUE,
    showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE,
    defaultSorted = "Count",
    defaultColDef = colDef(headerClass = "header", align = "left"),
    columns = list(
      Name = colDef(
        name = "Calendar Name",
        width = 200,
        defaultSortOrder = "desc",
        filterable = TRUE,
      ),
      Count = colDef(
        name = "Frequency",
        defaultSortOrder = "desc",
        cell = function(value) {
          width <- paste0(value * 100 / max(smry_calendar$Count), "%")
          value <- format(value, big.mark = ",")
          value <- format(value, width = 9, justify = "right")
          bar <- div(
            class = "bar-chart",
            style = list(marginRight = "6px"),
            div(class = "bar", style = list(width = width, backgroundColor = "#fc5185"))
          )
          div(class = "bar-cell", span(class = "number", value), bar)
        }
      )),
    compact = TRUE,
    bordered = TRUE,
    class = "categories-tbl"
  )
```

### Tutorials Datatable | <small> useR! 2021 <small> 

```{r}
select(tutorials_df, -c(1:2, 8, 11:12)) %>% 
  reactable(
    .,
    pagination = TRUE,
    showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE,
    defaultSorted = "attendees",
    defaultColDef = colDef(headerClass = "header", align = "left"),
    columns = list(
      title = colDef(
        name = "Tutorial Title",
        width = 200,
        defaultSortOrder = "desc",
        filterable = TRUE,
        html = TRUE,
        cell = function(value, index) {
          sprintf('<a href="%s" target="_blank">%s</a>', tutorials_df$individual_links[index], value)
        }
      ),
      language = colDef(
        name = "Language",
        filterable = TRUE
      ),
      start = colDef(
        name = "Start Time"
      ),
      end = colDef(
        name = "End Time"
      ),
      instructors = colDef(
        name = "Instructors",
        filterable = TRUE
      ),
      duration = colDef(
        name = "Duration"
      ),
      attendees = colDef(
        name = "Attendees Count",
        defaultSortOrder = "desc",
        cell = function(value) {
          width <- paste0(value * 100 / max(tutorials_df$attendees), "%")
          value <- format(value, big.mark = ",")
          value <- format(value, width = 9, justify = "right")
          bar <- div(
            class = "bar-chart",
            style = list(marginRight = "6px"),
            div(class = "bar", style = list(width = width, backgroundColor = "#fc5185"))
          )
          div(class = "bar-cell", span(class = "number", value), bar)
        }
      )
    ),
    compact = TRUE,
    bordered = TRUE,
    class = "categories-tbl"
  )
```
